Real Estate Investment Firm

Comprehensive AI Automation for Investment Operations

A fast growing capital raise firm, actively raising $3 billion, needed to reinvent their investor outreach and data management workflows to eliminate wasteful manual work, improve data accessibility, and scale their operations to new heights.

95%

Reduction in Manual Work

5000%

Return on Investment

46%

Increase in Qualified Meetings

Challenges

  • Manual data entry and manual outreach tasks consuming 100+ hours per week
  • Slow investor matching processes limiting growth
  • Disconnected CRM, email, and meeting systems creating bottlenecks
  • Time-consuming follow-up workflows reducing team effectiveness
  • Limited capacity to scale lead processing as business expanded

Solutions

  • AI Investor Matching Engine: Implemented an advanced internal AI system that allows team members to efficiently search through their investor database, handling complex real estate matching scenarios including multi-location awareness and asset class variations.
  • Integrated CRM & Communication System: Completely refreshed the CRM workflow connecting initial contact to follow-up, with automated status tracking and email integration. With AI sentiment analysis, the system automatically identifies and prioritizes high-priority leads.
  • Lead Generation Automation: Developed automated lead generation tools to extract investment opportunities and contact information with 99% success rate across 5000 qualified leads daily.
  • AI-Powered Meeting Preparation: Created a system that automatically generates company overviews, investment focus details, and strategic talking points before meetings with clients.

Impact

  • Efficiency Gains

    95% reduction in manual data entry (saving ~3500 hours annually), lead prospecting time reduced from 100+ weekly hours of manual work to completely automated, and capacity to handle 15x more leads with the same team size

  • Financial Impact

    Over $350,000 in operational savings since implementation with a 5000% return on investment within the first 6 months

  • Business Performance

    46% increase in qualified investor meetings, 80% reduction in investor matching time, and improved match quality between investors and opportunities.

" The new AI system automatically generates high fit matches for us and we are saving hours every week when it comes to investor outreach. "
